metadata.title: CVE-2018-8099 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Incorrect returning of an error code in the index.c:read_entry() functionleads to a double free in libgit2 before v0.26.2, which allows an attackerto cause a denial of service via a crafted repository index file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8099` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-27 - 0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1').
